title: Kris Kristofferson - 16 Biggest Hits
description:
One of the greatest country songwriters of his era, Kris Kristofferson had so many hit covers of his classic tunes that it can be hard to remember what a fine interpreter of his own material he was. Kristofferson&#039;s originals of now-standard tunes such as "For the Good Times," "Sunday Morning Comin&#039; Down" and "Me and Bobby McGee" are all present, along with many other fan favorites, on this solid budget-line collection. Featuring remastered sound but minimal packaging, this set is ideal for the casual fan.
